EmailTemplate.name: Corp Comm.Holiday 2015
EmailTemplate.subject: Happy Holidays
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Pivots,
The holiday season is a great opportunity to reflect on our collective accomplishments, and spend time with family and the ones you love.
Holidays at Pivotal present a wonderful opportunity to extend season's greetings to those outside the company. We've created a Pivotal Holiday e-card <[[https://sites.google.com/a/pivotal.io/inside-pivotal/corporate-marketing/corporate-communications/news-archive/holiday-card-2015]]>, designed for you to easily send (along with your personalized note) to customers, partners, vendors or prospective Pivots.
Sincere thanks for all of your hard work. Enjoy the holiday season.
Pivotal HQ
